sledgehammer

Class SledgeHammer

  • java.lang.Object
    • sledgehammer.util.Printable
      • sledgehammer.SledgeHammer

  • public class SledgeHammer
extends Printable
    Main class of operations for SledgeHammer.

    This class is used to initialize all components of SledgeHammer, and act as a approximation to access most components in SledgeHammer.

    TODO: Fix documentation.

      • addDefaultPermission

        public void addDefaultPermission(java.lang.String node,
                                 boolean flag)
        Adds a String permission-node to the default PermissionGroup with a given Boolean flag. All PermissionUsers with a specific definition will override this.
        Parameters:
        node - The String node to add.
        flag - The Boolean flag to set.

      • getPlayerDirty

        public Player getPlayerDirty(java.lang.String nameFragment)
        Returns a Player with a given nickname or user-name, or a fragment of that name. User-names are checked before Nicknames are checked.
        Parameters:
        nameFragment - The String name or fragment of the of the user-name or nickname of the Player.
        Returns:
        Returns a Player. If a Player is not identified with the given String fragment, null is returned.

      • getPermissionGroup

        public PermissionGroup getPermissionGroup(java.lang.String groupName)
        This method returns a permission group with the given name. The given name must be trimmed prior to the method call.
        Parameters:
        groupName - The name of the permission group.
        Returns:
        Returns a permission group. If no permission group has the name given, null is returned.

      • getDefaultPermissionGroup

        public PermissionGroup getDefaultPermissionGroup()
        Returns:
        Returns the permission group for the default player, without an assigned permission user, or a permission user without an assigned permission group.
